content: --आदः [दायमादत्ते, आदा-क] {1} one entitled to a share of patrimony, an heir; पुमान्दायादोऽदायादा स्त्री <ls>Nir.</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 118</ls>; <ls>Ms. 8. 160.</ls> {2} a son. {3} a relative, kinsman near or remote, a distant descendant. {4} a claimant or pretender in general; गवां गोषु वा दायादः <ls>Sk.</ls>
